search_results.snippet:
Mojito is a traditional Cuban highball. Traditionally, a mojito is a cocktail that 
consists of five ingredients: white rum, sugar (traditionally sugar cane juice), lime 
juice, soda water, and mint. The original Cuban recipe uses spearmint or yerba 
buena, a mint variety ... Mint leaves and lime wedges are used to garnish the 
glass.
